activities: As part of Fastly’s CDN Service offerings, customers may transmit electronic data, including personal data, through Fastly servers. In this context, Fastly acts as a data processor and may use the personal data to provide and support the service, but does not control the customer’s data. Fastly does not select the data that is transferred to its servers and any access to, or use of, such data is incidental to completing Fastly’s contractual obligations to its customer as a processor and is in accordance with customer’s instructions. Similarly, as part of Fastly’s customer support service operations, Fastly processes data, including personal data, on behalf of its customers. In this context, Fastly acts as a data processor and does not control the data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
